abstract: This document is a transcript of an interview given by Howard E. McCurdy to Franklin D. Martin. Martin gives details on his background including information on his family, education, and career path, his thoughts on the human space exploration initiative and the mission to the Moon, his presentation to the Vice President about Civil Space Exploration: The Lunar Base, and President Kennedy's pronouncement of America's intent to go to the Moon and the effects of the speech.
title: Transcript of Interview: Franklin D. Martin

publications.publicationName: The Decision to Send Humans Back to the Moon and on to Mars: Space Exploration Initiative History Project

related.title: The Decision to Send Humans Back to the Moon and on to Mars: Space Exploration Initiative History Project
